resources.string: This action cannot be undone. The preset will be removed permanently.
This mode disables all throttling and may cause system instability or freezes with screen capture animations.
RAGNAROK sends LED commands as fast as possible and can overwhelm your device. Use only if you understand the risks.
This app is currently in beta and may cause crashes or unstable behavior.
This app is provided for free and you should not be charged for obtaining it. It is available for free on this GitHub repo: exemplegithubrepo
